about_the_game:
Join Dragon3DInteractive Discord now :

Welcome travelers to Washington in the year 2650.

You are chosen to be one of many travelers to travel back in time to end world catastrophic events.

You will be placed in Division Z.
Division z is the Anti Zombie out break division.

You will be placed here to prevent the zombie outbreak that's happening now.
There are a few places on earth where it's save to be.

To prevent the massif outbreak you need to prevent a few Small outbreaks, before you can end the hole outbreak you also need to prevent Time Corruption. In Small steps to make a bigger impact in the end

Your first mission will be a simulation of the real BIG prevention mission

Your goal is to prevent All of the mayhem that's happening now in the world.
And the goal is to prevent the creation of mutagen Zero,
The creation takes place in Germany 1943.


ARE YOU READY TO BE A TRAVELER


More About the game

Zero To death is a round based Zombie shooter.
With a story line build in the map in the form of easter eggs.

You can Play this game in multiple ways.
Farm the living .... out of the zombies and try to get your highest round in,
or go for the easter egg and complete the story line and unlock cool new skins for your gun and player.

Plans For the game:
4 to 5 Maps on release

More then 30 guns, With challenges, To unlock cool cosmetics.
Character customization so you look different to all the other travelers.

Map Editor (Planning for release BUT can be added later Will Release for sure)
Every 90 days New maps will be added.


Road map Zero To death After release

Year 1:
6 new maps
15 new Guns 60 new cosmetics for the guns
6 new easter eggs
5 new Travelers to pick from

Year 2 :
Zero to Death Outbreak Mode
(This will be a open world mode where you need to survive out side the main city's and will be progression based to unlock more of the world).
Outbreak mode will be a survival based game mode where you join a Server and just survive on until the server gets wiped.

Normal Mode :
4 new maps > because we hope that the players will make a lot of new maps for the game itself with the map editor and steam workshop
10 new guns with 40 new Cosmetics
4 new easter eggs
4 new travelers

The map editor will have some massive new feature, fully implemented and its no longer a map editor but a mod kit.
From this point on you can create everything, from Upgrade stations to weapons.
It's all up to your imagination.

Year 3 :
Zero to death 2 ?????
detailed_description:
Announcement:

Pre-Alpha V0.20 is available now!

Have Fun Dont vergor To send The bugs With the form


This version Wil Stay For the First 3 days of the alphja test

What is available now:

1.Play Zone: Small area where the zombies spawn directly in the map.
2,Zombies that look like Mannequins XD.
3.3 weapon
4.Round-based with infinite rounds.
5.Full Healt system
6. Upgrade Machines
7. Zombies drop Specials That work for 15 seconds With Ui Visabil
8. Full level layout for the play test


10. The Pre alpha wil Stay Live Intil MP System is good to go and runnen For now MP is not Working

When 0.20 is done, the test will conclude after two weeks of V. 0.20 release of Pre-Alpha.

What will be added in the Pre-Alpha:

1. Zombie Skins and animations (99%).
2. At least 3 more weapons. (100%)
3. 2 more zones in the map.(100%)
4. 2 Body Upgrades.(100%)
5. 2 weapon Upgrades.(100%)
6. A bit more Level editing so it looks like a game and not like a side project.(99%)
7. Working Player UI with Cash, Round, Ammo Count, and more. (100%)
8. Probably more XD. This is a pure Mechanical Test.(100%)


Just to answer it here directly:

Is the multiplayer button going to work in Pre-Alpha Test Period 1?

Quick Answer: NOPE Was the old awnser In Pre Alpha V 0.20P.2 There wil be A MP test
BUT My GF Is abbout to give birth So That Update Can take Alteast a few weeks to Complete

This is because I just changed to Unreal Engine 5.4 Original Release. This is where the game is being built on, and that will not be changing anymore.

When will the MP Button work?

That's going to be a Pre-Alpha MP test session in a few months.

Thank you all for testing the game. Don't forget to Wishlist the game and let's slay some zombies!


Update Notes

Patch Note:

Added cash on ui
Added door to unlock
Added Cass add and remove function

Fixed/ Changes

Changed the position of the Projectile to spawn

name: Zero To Death

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows
  • Processor: Ryzen 5 3000 series Intel I5 6000 series
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 1050 series or AMD Radeon RX550
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 25 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Motherboard Basic
  • VR Support: Comming soon When implemented Rift S
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows
  • Processor: ryzen 7 7000 series Or intel I9 11series
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia RTX 30 series Or Radeon RX 6600 + ( Ray tracing Cape)
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 25 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Motherboard Basic
  • VR Support: Comming soon When implemented Steam Index

short_description: ZTD is a ROUND BASED ZOMBIE SHOOTER
